fo.resourcePack.modmenuhelper: §7Lists mods' main features and options in Mod Menu§r
modmenu.dropInfo.line1: FO mods have §9✎§r or §8✎§r, alts have §b*§r;
modmenu.summaryTranslation.advancementin:
Bigger, smarter advancement screen
§9✎§8 Colors, info box size, ...
modmenu.summaryTranslation.bettermounthu:
Shows food and XP while on a mob
§8✎ (no options)
modmenu.summaryTranslation.bobby:
§b*§r Keeps loaded chunks visible in servers
§9✎§8 Block entities, dim chunks, keep cache, ...
modmenu.summaryTranslation.borderlessmin:
Full screen with Alt+Tab support (opt-in)
§9✎§8 Toggle mod, macOS support, custom size, ...
modmenu.summaryTranslation.capes:
OptiFine's and other capes
§9✎§8 Providers, preferred provider, ...
modmenu.summaryTranslation.citresewn:
OptiFine's custom items
§9✎§8 Toggle mod, allow broken packs, ...
modmenu.summaryTranslation.colormatic:
OptiFine's custom colors
§9✎§8 Clear sky/void, light smoothing
modmenu.summaryTranslation.continuity:
OptiFine's connected textures
§9✎§8 Toggle mod, method, resource packs
modmenu.summaryTranslation.cull-less-lea:
§b*§r Faster tree leaves
§9✎§8 Toggle mod, leaf depth
modmenu.summaryTranslation.cem:
§b*§r OptiFine's custom entities (alpha)
§9✎§8 OptiFine support, model fix
modmenu.summaryTranslation.debugify:
Fixes bugs, disables Mojang's telemetry
§9✎§8 See FO wiki for more info
modmenu.summaryTranslation.dynamicfps:
Reduces FPS in the background
§9✎§8 Toggle mod, restore on hover, ...
modmenu.summaryTranslation.enhancedblock:
Faster chests, signs, beds etc.
§9✎§8 Blocks to improve, method
modmenu.summaryTranslation.entity_textur:
OptiFine's random & emissive mobs
§9✎§8 Random mobs, emissivity, eye blinking, ...
modmenu.summaryTranslation.entityculling:
Stops rendering mobs behind walls
§8✎ (only advanced options)
modmenu.summaryTranslation.e4mc_minecraf:
Open worlds to public just like LAN
§9✎§8 Configure through LAN settings
modmenu.summaryTranslation.fabricskyboxe:
Custom skies
§9✎§8 Expand the mod to configure (click ▼ on icon)
modmenu.summaryTranslation.fsb-interop:
OptiFine support for FabricSkyBoxes
§9✎§8 Formats, prefer own format, ...
modmenu.summaryTranslation.fabrishot:
Take HD screenshots with F9
§9✎§8 Override F2, resolution, keybind, ...
modmenu.summaryTranslation.farsight:
Keeps loaded chunks visible in servers
§8✎ (only advanced options)
modmenu.summaryTranslation.fastquit:
Quits from singleplayer instantly
§9✎§8 Toasts, indicator, ...
modmenu.summaryTranslation.holdthatchunk:
§b*§r Keeps loaded chunks visible in servers
§8✎ (only advanced options)
modmenu.summaryTranslation.iris:
OptiFine's shaders
§9✎§8 Toggle mod, select shader, keybinds, ...
modmenu.summaryTranslation.immediatelyfa:
Optimizes mobs, container blocks, GUI, HUD
§8✎ (only advanced options)
modmenu.summaryTranslation.itemmodelfix:
§b*§r Fixes transparent lines in held items
§9✎§8 Method
modmenu.summaryTranslation.lambdabetterg:
OptiFine's "better grass"
§9✎§8 Quality, snow, resource pack
modmenu.summaryTranslation.languagereloa:
Instant language switching, searchbar
§9✎§8 Multi-language Creative search, ...
modmenu.summaryTranslation.lithium:
Optimizes physics and chunks
§8✎ (only advanced options)
modmenu.summaryTranslation.isxander-main:
Modpack version in title screen
§8✎ (only advanced options)
modmenu.summaryTranslation.midnightcontr:
§b*§r Controller and touchscreen support
§9✎§8 Input method, keybinds, controller options, ...
modmenu.summaryTranslation.mixintrace:
Helps developers find the cause of crashes
§8✎ (no options)
modmenu.summaryTranslation.modmenu:
This mod menu
§9✎§8 Button placement, filtering, sorting, ...
modmenu.summaryTranslation.modernfix:
Optimizes loading speeds, reduces RAM usage
§8✎ (only advanced options)
modmenu.summaryTranslation.moreculling:
Stops rendering hidden sides of blocks
§9✎§8 Toggle blocks, item frames, ...
modmenu.summaryTranslation.modelfix:
Fixes transparent lines in items and blocks
§8✎ (only advanced options)
modmenu.summaryTranslation.nochatreports:
Consistent chat status indicators
§9✎§8 Toggle mod, chat indicators, prompt mode, ...
modmenu.summaryTranslation.phosphor:
§b*§r Optimizes light, faster chunks
§8✎ (only advanced options)
modmenu.summaryTranslation.puzzle:
Some OptiFine features
§9✎§8 Resource pack splash screen, ...
modmenu.summaryTranslation.rrls:
Resource packs load in the background
§8✎ (only advanced options)
modmenu.summaryTranslation.sodium:
Optimizes rendering, better FPS
§9✎§8 In Video Settings: optimizations
modmenu.summaryTranslation.sodium-extra:
OptiFine's graphics options
§9✎§8 In Video Settings: animations, particles, ...
modmenu.summaryTranslation.yosbr:
Modpack's default options
§9✎§8 To reset, see FO wiki
modmenu.summaryTranslation.zoomify:
Zoom by holding C
§9✎§8 Distance, cinematic camera, keybind, ...
